TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 控制項的資料行型別，這控制項繫結至資料來源中的欄位。

span.span: A column type for the control that is bound to a field in a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的資料行類型控制項來顯示資料來源中的欄位的內容。Use the column type in a control to display the contents of a field in the data source. 值會列在單一資料行中。The values are listed in a single column. 欄位已連結至，因此對應的資料格的資料來源中的任何更新以反映控制項。The field is linked to the , so any updates in the data source will reflect in the corresponding cells of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此資料行類型是預設值控制項。This column type is the default for the control. 若要控制此資料行的外觀，請使用的樣式屬性控制項。To control appearance of this column, use the style properties of the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此資料行的值來自於使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用中的資料行類型控制項來顯示資料來源中的欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use a column type in the control to display the fields in a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定資料行中項目的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for items in the column.

value.span: 格式字串，其指定資料行中項目的顯示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format of items in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂格式的資料行中的項目。Use the property to provide a custom format for the items in the column. 資料格式字串包含兩個部分，以分隔，在表單中的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字串{0:F2}會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號表示格式字串而不是常值的字串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 只可以將此值設定為 0，因為每個資料格中只能有一個值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要顯示在值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示在指定的大小寫的十六進位字元。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定各種格式中的資料行控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify various formats for the columns in the control. `Qty`資料行格式化為整數，`Price`資料行格式化為貨幣，`Weight`資料行格式化為十進位數字，而`Expires`資料行格式化為簡短日期和時間字串。The `Qty` column is formatted as an integer, the `Price` column is formatted as currency, the `Weight` column is formatted as a decimal number, and the `Expires` column is formatted as a short date and time string. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/cs/BoundColumnSampleCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/vb/BoundColumnSampleVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否在項目可以進行編輯。Use the property to specify whether the items in the can be edited. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式判斷資料行是否唯讀。This property can also be used to programmatically determine whether the column is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定處於唯讀狀態。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a is read-only. .Aspx 檔案會定義三個結合欄位控制項，並將項目資料行設定為唯讀。The .aspx file defines three BoundColumn controls, and sets the Item column to read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/CS/boundcolumnreadonlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/VB/boundcolumnreadonlyvb.aspx#1)]
